page.title: 06BROWNIES
page.content: Brownies is an international organisation for girls between the ages of seven and eleven years.Brownies wear a brown tunic uniform to their meetings which take place once a week.The girls are divided into small groups called sixes which have names such as Pixies, Gnomes, Sprites and Elves.Each member is required to make a promise at a special ceremony when she joins,this is called an enrollment .She promises to "do her best,do her duty to God,to serve the queen,and to help other people."The adult leaders in a pack of Brownies are called Brown Owl and Tawny Owl and they organise activities for the Brownies each week.
